title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-3 - Rights And Obligations Of Applicants And Recipients And Sponsors Of Aliens
content:

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 22, 34[3][f], 131[1], [6], 337, 349-a, 355[3], 390, 410[1], 410-u-410-z, 424-a, 455, 460-d; L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
